name: Polarity (itch) (Sinbadthepoet, Kanomisu, Sukhbir, acdiorr)
description:
WASD to move the cursor.

Spacebar to select objects.

Move objects to help them overcome their own inherent magnet self racism.

Polarity is a strand type game, where we oppose the stick and embrace the rope. Move objects to join our magnet friends around and create a connected and happier world!
